title: Boy, 10, shot in leg
content:
SAN ANTONIO - A 10-year-old boy was shot in the leg Saturday night on the city's South Side.
Police said an argument between two families earlier in the day led to gunfire at 8:45 p.m. in the 100 block of Pima.
A gunman fired about four shots at the house, wounding the boy. He was taken to University Hospital but is expected to be OK.
Police said they know who the gunman is and are searching for him.
